text: "Llorar" is the fifth single from the album ¿Con quién se queda el perro? and the first of the deluxe edition, by the Mexican duo Jesse & Joy. It was confirmed as the fifth single by the brothers via Twitter and released worldwide on October 20, 2012, via digital download. It was composed as a ballad song within the Latin pop genre, which talks about the crises that can occur in a couple due to third parties. It was used as the soundtrack for the soap opera Corona de Lágrimas.
title: Cry (song)
